feature.label: Tracker Fair Excel Import Export Feature
feature.description: Tracker Fair Excel Import and Export, exports and imports Fair Registration and Weigh-In Animal Event data to and from MicroSoft Excel Spreadsheet files.
feature.copyright: Tracker Fair Excel Import and Export Copyright (C) 2008, 2009 Verticon, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
